Modern Egyptians = Ancient Egyptians, I proved this beyond a doubt.

There are certain facts that needs to be established pls...
According to the papyrus of Hunefer, the high priest...he says "they(ancient Egyptians) come from the beginning of the Nile where hapi dwells, at the foothill of the mountain of the moon(mount kilamanjaro)"....so it must be established the origins of ancient Egyptians.... They came from inner part of Africa.

Again, it is well known that Ta-seti shows the beginning of ancient Egyptian civilization, including the medu neter(hieroglyphs) .
Again, there were at least 12 Pharohs in Ta-seti before the first pharoh in Egypt...

We shouldn't also forget that egypt was and still part of Africa... Any attempt by anybody to move it to western Asia which is mistakenly called middle east is a lie ..

We should also know that the first 1000yrs of the dynastic period in Egypt were purely Africans and had not had any non African interference.

The pyramids were built between 3rd and 6th dynasty.....and the first hebrew(Abraham) was born in the 13 dynasty.... Meaning, there was no Isaac, no Jacob, no Joseph.
Again... There are physical evidence, I repeat physical evidence of cultures and practices of ancient Egyptians who moved inward of Africa because of the constant attack of Egypt by foreigners.

Moreover, Herodotus writes that the Egyptians and Ethiopians appeared as the same people.. Black face with wholly hair...
And even said Zeus and Apollo were from Africa.. And they had to return to Africa at least once a year to renew their immortality.
We should also know that another name for Zeus is Aeithiop which means black God or burnt face....


Be honest and straightforward in your video.....
There were so many attacks on Egypt
Hyksos, Assyrians,Persians,Greeks,Romans,Muslim Arabs(in just AD640) , later the Frenchs and what have you....
There have been so many presence of foreigners (I mean non Africans/ non black people) in Egypt.. Majority of the native Africans moved inward of Africa and the rest stayed at the modern day south of Egypt... Others intermarried..... But the first 1000 years of ancient Egypt was purely black or African civilization...
